name: DaYa's World
description:
DaYa’s World is a 2.5D interactive story game that follows DaYa as she uses her magic brush to create and restore her universe. 

It aims to introduce players to the style of Chinese painting and calligraphy and allow the player to take interest in Chinese myth through environmental storytelling.

Note

For MAC players, please download and play the game through the itch.io app (here).

How to Play
